Question
========

A person achieves a score of 13.9 good on a Statistics test. The mean score of all participants in the test is 18.3 with a standard deviation 1.2. The z-score of the person with 13.9 correct is then equal to

Answerlist
----------

* -4.03
* -3.74
* -3.67

Solution
========

Answerlist
----------

* 4.03: Incorrect
* 3.74: Incorrect
* 3.67: Correct
